caption: Splitter - Fetch Native Balance
doc: Fetch the network native token balance of a splitter.

AJL.caption: Wallet Address
AJL.doc: This action fetches the native token balance this wallet address is owed from the splitter.
AJL.name: wallet_address

AJM.caption: Splitter Contract Address
AJM.doc: The smart contract address of the splitter being distributed. Please note: The user calling this function must be once the recipients of the splitter.
AJM.name: split_contract_address

AJa.caption: RPC URL
AJa.doc: Choose the network is the splitter you are fetching information from is deployed on. Mainnet example: https://main-light.eth.linkpool.io
AJa.name: default_provider
